name: Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory
description: AWS's managed service for AI agent memory management with cross-session persistence, production-ready long-term memory capabilities for context-aware agents.
community_quotes: Fully managed service that enables AI agents to remember past interactions
Delivers intelligent, context-aware, and personalized responses

name: Mistral Devstral 2 & Vibe CLI
description: Open-source coding-focused language models (Devstral 2: 123B parameters, Devstral Small 2: 24B parameters) with interactive Vibe CLI terminal agent for enterprise-grade coding assistance.
community_quotes: Bye bye Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Codex
Available for free usage on Kilo Code and Cline platforms
